title: The Best New Tricks in macOS Catalina!
description: At WWDC 2019, Apple announced macOS Catalina. We talk about the best new features. Try AdGuard free today at -  and use coupon code SNAZZY_LABS to save 30% at checkout.  Follow Snazzy Labs on Twitter -  Follow me on Instagram -   macOS Catalina brings a lot of new features like Sidecar, Voice Control accessibility features, and updates to the Notes, Reminders, System Preferences. So long, iTunes! Apple replaces iTunes with Apple Music for Mac along with AppleTV for the upcoming AppleTV+ streaming service and a new Podcasts app built inside of the Project Catalyst framework which brings your favorite iOS apps to Mac this fall!
transcript: At WWDC last week, Apple announced the latest version of MacOS. Catalina! And I'm here to show you some of the... new features that it will bring when it comes out later this fall. And you will need a MacBook, well basically, or an iMac with basically the 2015 Era or later. Both devices need the ability to encode and decode each EVC on the ASIC or SOC. So that's why they need newer hardware. Although, if you do have an old mac, there is a workaround. Because if I extend the display, it appears as an AirPlay device on my laptop, I just press iPad Pro, and suddenly, it makes my iPad a secondary display! And, I can drag windows over here, just like I would a secondary monitor. I have it set up Right to Left right now, but see that? And you can tell that the latency is really, really good. Ah, but what you can also do, is mirror the display. And it makes your main Mac look a little bit funny, admittedly. But, what it allows you to do, it basically have your entire Mac here on the iPad. And again, latency is excellent! You can control this, with the Touch Pad, if you want. Or you can control it with the Apple Pencil! Now, it doesn't support, touch input.
